page.title: 14CHURCH LIFE
page.content:
Cornish Hall End shares a vicar with Finchingfield,so there is only 1 service on Sundays,2 on Festival days. In 1981,the church was in danger of closing.The congregation was down to 7 the churchwardens were both elderly, and there was no other help.The church had no money,though much was needed for repairs.A questionnaire was sent to all 95 houses in the parish,asking for offers of help.As a result,new life has come to the church _ new churchwardens appointed and the con- gregation doubled.
Autumn sees the church's Harvest Festival,with an auction of produce the next day.The main fund-raising event,the Christmas Bazaar,is held in the village hall,and the Christmas Carol service is always well attended.
